thread.title: US will give North Korea 'a military show of strength'
thread.title_full: US will give North Korea 'a military show of strength'

title: US will give North Korea 'a military show of strength'
text: Trump's senior policy adviser says the US will give North Korea a military show of strength 'beyond anything anyone can imagine' after missile test Stephen Miller told CBS that Trump will ask Congress to give military money Said that would send a signal that US was planning military show of strength Comment came after North Korea launched a new ballistic missile test Trump was criticized for not mentioning North Korea in response speech But Miller said standing on stage with Japanese leader was a 'show of strength' Analysts say, however, that Trump's choices with North Korea are very limited And an official says economic sanctions are more likely than military conflict Published: 22:06 GMT, 12 February 2017 | Updated: 03:39 GMT, 13 February 2017 47 shares
